src:
Danas oblačno i suvo uz manji porast dnevne temperature

02 Nov 2019, 09:10

U većem delu Srbije danas će biti oblačno i suvo uz manji porast dnevne temperature, a uveče i tokom noći moguća je kratkotrajna kiša, saopštio je Republički hidrometeorološki zavod (RHMZ).Duvaće uglavnom slab i umeren, a u planinskim predelima i košavskom području jak vetar. Vetar će na jugu Banata dostizati udare olujne jačine. Najniža temperatura kretaće se od dva do šest stepeni, a najviša od 14 do 19 stepeni Celzijusa.U Beogradu će biti oblačno uz košavu. U toku noći ka nedelji kratkotrajna kiša.Najniža temperatura biće oko šest, a najviša oko 15 stepeni. Biometeorološka prognoza za 2. novembar 2019. godine:Biometeorološka situacija može nepovolјno uticati na srčane bolesnike, a u košavskom području poseban oprez se savetuje nervno labilnim osobama. Mogući su reumatski bolovi i glavobolјa.
text:
Today it is cloudy and dry with a slight increase in daily temperature

02 Nov 2019, 09:10

In most parts of Serbia it will be cloudy and dry today with a slight increase in daytime temperatures and overnight rain is possible, the Republican Hydrological and Meteorological Institute (RHMZ) said. The wind will reach storm surges in the south of Banat. The lowest temperature will range from two to six degrees, and the highest from 14 to 19 degrees Celsius. In Belgrade it will be cloudy with a basket. It will rain a bit during the night. The lowest temperature will be around 6, and the highest will be around 15 degrees. Biometeorological forecast for November 2, 2019: The biometeorological situation can adversely affect heart patients, and in the Kosava region, special caution is advised to nervously labile individuals. Rheumatic pain and headache are possible.
